ch.epfl.alpano.gui.ChannelPainter

    ch.epfl.alpano.gui  

    • Uses of ChannelPainter in ch.epfl.alpano.gui

      Methods in ch.epfl.alpano.gui that return ChannelPainter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default ChannelPainter ChannelPainter.add(float constant)
      Adds a constant to the value of the method valueAt of the ChannelPainter.
      default ChannelPainter ChannelPainter.clamped()
      Apply a mathematical function (max(0,min(x,1))) to valueAt of each pixel.
      default ChannelPainter ChannelPainter.cycling()
      Apply a mathematical function (xmod1) to valueAt of each pixel.
      default ChannelPainter ChannelPainter.div(float constant)
      Divides a constant to the value of the method valueAt of the ChannelPainter.
      default ChannelPainter ChannelPainter.inverted()
      Apply a mathematical function (1âˆ’x) to valueAt of each pixel.
      default ChannelPainter ChannelPainter.map(java.util.function.DoubleUnaryOperator po)
      Apply a unary operator to the value of the function valueAt.
      static ChannelPainter ChannelPainter.maxDistanceToNeighbors(Panorama p)
      Gives a new ChannelPainter which override valueAt.
      default ChannelPainter ChannelPainter.mul(float constant)
      Multiply a constant to the value of the method valueAt of the ChannelPainter.
      default ChannelPainter ChannelPainter.sub(float constant)
      Subtract a constant to the value of the method valueAt of the ChannelPainter.
      Methods in ch.epfl.alpano.gui with parameters of type ChannelPainter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ImagePainter ImagePainter.gray(ChannelPainter greyHue, ChannelPainter opacity)
      Gives a new ImagePainter made of gray with 2 different ChannelPainter.
      static ImagePainter ImagePainter.hsb(ChannelPainter hue, ChannelPainter saturation, ChannelPainter brightness, ChannelPainter opacity)
      Gives a new ImagePainter with different colors made of 4 ChannelPainter.
